title: (x) Script font 'Taste Restaurant' - probably custom {Mike Y}
content:
Hi

This may be a bit of a long shot but does anyone know if the 'Taste' in this logo is a font or hand drawn?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100212205116im_/http:/typophile.com/files/taste_3427.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100212205116im_/http:/typophile.com/files/taste1_4690.jpg)
author: simundo

comments.content:
My guess would be hand-drawn, because of the way the letters 'st' interact, and the general very casual style. When there are no repeated letters it's almost impossible to be sure, because OpenType fonts now have many ligatures and alternates that could be used. My other data point is that it doesn't look familiar, for whatever that's worth.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Mike

I agree about the 'st', thanks for your feedback, I appreciate it!

Simon

I would say custom, only because it's a script that Mike doesn't recognize :-)

- Lex

Lex, that's undeserved, but appreciated. Thanks.

- Mike
